input.sentences: we had a great time at work today .
we had some new musicians with us .
we had time to play in the afternoon .
we had to practice for tomorrow 's performance .

output.sentences: It was time to start our band
One of our musicians had a sore throat.
We gave her time to feel better to play so we gave her an hour before we go practice in the afternoon.
Tomorrow will be the last day to practice before the big performance.
We spent a lot of time practicing and hours of hard work.
